simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Initialize the tables that the OS FS API uses to keep track of information about objects

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Creates a file specified by const char *path, with read/write permissions by access. The file is also automatically opened by the create call.

entry.para: OS_FS_ERR_INVALID_POINTER if path is NULL
OS_FS_ERR_PATH_TOO_LONG if path exceeds the maximum number of chars
OS_FS_ERR_PATH_INVALID if path cannot be parsed
OS_FS_ERR_NAME_TOO_LONG if the name of the file is too long
OS_FS_ERROR if permissions are unknown or OS call fails
OS_FS_ERR_NO_FREE_FDS if there are no free file descripors left
OS_FS_SUCCESS if success

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Opens a file. access parameters are OS_READ_ONLY,OS_WRITE_ONLY, or OS_READ_WRITE

entry.para: OS_FS_ERR_INVALID_POINTER if path is NULL
OS_FS_ERR_PATH_TOO_LONG if path exceeds the maximum number of chars
OS_FS_ERR_PATH_INVALID if path cannot be parsed
OS_FS_ERR_NAME_TOO_LONG if the name of the file is too long
OS_FS_ERROR if permissions are unknown or OS call fails
OS_FS_ERR_NO_FREE_FDS if there are no free file descripors left
OS_FS_SUCCESS if success File descriptor if success
OS_FS_ERR_INVALID_FD if the file descriptor passed in is invalid
OS_FS_ERROR if file descriptor could not be closed
OS_FS_SUCCESS if success File descriptor if success

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Reads up to nbytes from a file, and puts them into buffer.

parameterdescription.para: buffer Pointer to buffer to populate

entry.para: OS_FS_ERR_INVALID_POINTER if buffer is a null pointer
OS_FS_ERR_INVALID_FD if the file descriptor passed in is invalid
OS_FS_ERROR if file descriptor could not be closed Number of bytes read if success

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Writes to a file. Copies up to a maximum of nbtyes of buffer to the file described in filedes

parameterdescription.para: buffer Pointer to buffer to write from

entry.para: OS_FS_ERR_INVALID_POINTER if buffer is a null pointer
OS_FS_ERR_INVALID_FD if the file descriptor passed in is invalid
OS_FS_ERROR if file descriptor could not be closed Number of bytes read if success

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Writes to a file. Copies up to a maximum of nbtyes of buffer to the file described in filedes

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Returns information about a file or directory in a os_fs_stat structure

entry.para: OS_FS_ERR_INVALID_POINTER if path is NULL
OS_FS_ERR_PATH_TOO_LONG if path exceeds the maximum number of chars
OS_FS_ERR_PATH_INVALID if path cannot be parsed
OS_FS_ERR_NAME_TOO_LONG if the name of the file is too long
OS_FS_ERROR if permissions are unknown or OS call fails
OS_FS_SUCCESS if success File descriptor if success

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Sets the read/write pointer to a specific offset in a specific file. Whence is either OS_SEEK_SET, OS_SEEK_CUR, or OS_SEEK_END

entry.para: OS_FS_ERR_INVALID_FD if the file descriptor passed in is invalid the new offset from the beginning of the file

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Removes a given filename from the drive

entry.para: OS_FS_ERR_INVALID_POINTER if path is NULL
OS_FS_ERR_PATH_TOO_LONG if path exceeds the maximum number of chars
OS_FS_ERR_PATH_INVALID if path cannot be parsed
OS_FS_ERR_NAME_TOO_LONG if the name of the file is too long
OS_FS_ERROR if permissions are unknown or OS call fails
OS_FS_SUCCESS if success
OS_FS_ERR_INVALID_POINTER if path is NULL
OS_FS_ERR_PATH_TOO_LONG if path exceeds the maximum number of chars
OS_FS_ERR_PATH_INVALID if path cannot be parsed
OS_FS_ERR_NAME_TOO_LONG if the name of the file is too long
OS_FS_ERROR if permissions are unknown or OS call fails
OS_FS_SUCCESS if success

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Copies a single file from src to dest

entry.para: OS_FS_ERR_INVALID_POINTER if path is NULL
OS_FS_ERR_PATH_TOO_LONG if path exceeds the maximum number of chars
OS_FS_ERR_PATH_INVALID if path cannot be parsed
OS_FS_ERR_NAME_TOO_LONG if the name of the file is too long
OS_FS_ERROR if permissions are unknown or OS call fails
OS_FS_SUCCESS if success

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Moves a single file from src to dest

entry.para: OS_FS_ERR_INVALID_POINTER if path is NULL
OS_FS_ERR_PATH_TOO_LONG if path exceeds the maximum number of chars
OS_FS_ERR_PATH_INVALID if path cannot be parsed
OS_FS_ERR_NAME_TOO_LONG if the name of the file is too long
OS_FS_ERROR if permissions are unknown or OS call fails
OS_FS_SUCCESS if success

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Makes a directory specified by path.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: The access parameter is currently unused.

entry.para: OS_FS_ERR_INVALID_POINTER if path is NULL
OS_FS_ERR_PATH_TOO_LONG if path exceeds the maximum number of chars
OS_FS_ERR_PATH_INVALID if path cannot be parsed
OS_FS_ERROR if permissions are unknown or OS call fails
OS_FS_SUCCESS if success

simplesect.para: if there is an error Pointer to a directory if success

entry.para: OS_FS_ERROR if permissions are unknown or OS call fails
OS_FS_SUCCESS if success

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Obtains directory entry data for the next file from an open directory
pointer to the next entry for success NULL if error or end of directory is reached

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Removes a directory from the structure (must be an empty directory)

entry.para: OS_FS_ERR_INVALID_POINTER if path is NULL
OS_FS_ERR_PATH_TOO_LONG if path exceeds the maximum number of chars
OS_FS_ERR_PATH_INVALID if path cannot be parsed
OS_FS_ERROR if permissions are unknown or OS call fails
OS_FS_SUCCESS if success

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Copies the information of the given file descriptor into a structure passed in

parameterdescription.para: OS_FDTableEntry Pointer to file property struct

entry.para: OS_FS_ERR_INVALID_FD if the file descriptor passed in is invalid
OS_FS_SUCCESS if success

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Checks to see if a file is open

entry.para: OS_FS_ERROR if the file is not open
OS_FS_SUCCESS if the file is open

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Allows a file to be closed by name.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: This will only work if the name passed in is the same name used to open the file.

entry.para: OS_FS_ERR_PATH_INVALID if path cannot be parsed
OS_FS_ERROR if the file close returned an error
OS_FS_SUCCESS if success

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Closes All open files that were opened through the OSAL

entry.para: OS_FS_ERROR if one or more file close returned an error
OS_FS_SUCCESS if the files were all closed without error
